alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued September 14 at 12:49PM AKDT until September 17 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...East winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
